tips: Always use consistent units when measuring (all in inches, feet, meters, etc.)
For circles, remember that circumference is the perimeter of a circular shape
Double-check your measurements to ensure accurate calculations
For irregular shapes, break them down into simpler geometric shapes
Use π ≈ 3.14159 for more precise circle calculations
Regular polygons have all sides equal in length
